column5: For those of you who are unaware, there is an auction taking place now to raise funds for Tyler French. This last auction of the year will end Sunday March 2nd 2008. You can view and bid on items by going HERE!
Just to bump this up for those that don't use the "view new posts" icon.  Lots of stuff to bid on... from Lures to Northern Get Aways!
Tanks Wayne...I couldn't remember how to do dat.
Lets keep this close to the top..

Maureen has had a brain freeze what with starting a new position at work and all she missed telling Roy that there is another 1 person portable Fish Trap (like the one Tony B chose as his prize at the Tyler event and that there is an I-Pod Nano also up for bids...  Roy is up to his (you know what) in alligators but the items  should appear in the auction area soon...
The Nano is the one with the video one that everyone talks about?  I don't use these things so I really don't know.
Thanks Norm... Sure Roy's right on it... and Cranks I'd avoid the confusion and bid when the thread comes up.
Send 'er back up to the top boys!

Thank you everyone. At 5:08pm today you had accumulated bids of $3250.00. That's GREAT. We still have till Sunday noon to up our bids. We might even get more items for auction. Thanks again folks...you guys are super!

Come'on folks! Less than two days left to get bidding on the auction items!  Help a kid out and make yourself feel good at the same time, knowing that you helped another human being along with their life.

Hey, I'm sorry I haven't been around much this week and I wanted to say a big thanks to everyone for all your bids, and to those who keep promoting it, you have no idea how much this means.  Good luck Maureen
I have two St.Croix rods coming to me ...ya baby!!
less than 24 hrs to go  Take a look not only a great cause but some deals to be had and I gotta get that Fishtrap outta my garage before I 'm tempted to use it !  TB
